# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This website hosts the materials for the workshop "An Introduction to Network Analysis for GIS". This training workshop was designed and is delivered by Dr. Carmen Cabrera-Arnau, Prof. Francisco Rowe, Dr. Rafael Prieto Curiel, Andrew Renninger and Valentina Marin Maureira

The website is free to use and is licensed under the Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International.
